column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I love to ride the bus in my town .
#text=On Saturdays I get up early and walk down to the bus stop .
#text=I wait for the bus to come at 8:15 .
#text=I climb up the stairs and drop my fare into the collection box and say hello to the driver .
#text=Before the bus starts up again I move all the way to the back to sit in the last row of seats .
#text=Some with shopping bags , others all dressed up and some like me dressed casual for a summer morning .
#text=I take the bus all the way until it gets to the center of town where I get off .
#text=Before i get off I get a transfer ticket .
#text=I look at the bus route map at the bus stop and look for a part of the city i want to explore .
#text=For 75 cents i can get to any part of my city .
#text=I see all kinds of people and get to explore the city I live in .
